subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andre Iguodala scored 31 points and the Philadelphia 76ers collected their sixth consecutive victory, defeating the Los Angeles Lakers, 108-92, and spoiling the return of Kobe Bryant.
snippet: Andre Iguodala scored 31 points and the Philadelphia 76ers collected their sixth consecutive victory, defeating the Los Angeles Lakers, 108-92, and spoiling the return of Kobe Bryant.
